title: Understanding Stabilization
text: Stabilization is a crucial step in the treatment of addiction. It involves helping the client through a challenging phase.

title: Key Components of Stabilization
text: During stabilization, the focus is on ensuring the client is medically stable and free from substances.

hintAnswer: assisting a client through a period of acute detoxification and withdrawal so that they are medically stable and $$substance-free$$
title: Identifying Stabilization
text: Which of the following best describes stabilization?
choices: focuses on meeting the client where they are and helping to prevent overdose, reducing transmission of infectious diseases, and improving the overall health of the client
combines the use of medication and behavioral therapy to prevent opioid overdose and treat substance use disorder
assisting a client through a period of acute detoxification and withdrawal so that they are medically stable and $$substance-free$$
